alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 4:51PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Livingston, Allegany and southern Ontario Counties through 530 PM EST... At 449 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Wayland to 6 miles north of Coryville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dansville, Wellsville, Alfred, Naples, Whitesville, Springwater, Friendship, Scio, Canadice, Bolivar, Andover, Belmont, Angelica, Alma, Ossian, Canaseraga, Almond, Richburg, West Almond and Birdsall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. Interstate 86 between exits 29 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
